description: This juicy turkey roast features a sumptuous stuffing packed with flavour. Earthy veggies combined with tart cranberries makes for the perfect pairing.
name: Turkey Breast Roast & Veggies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Put turkey breast roast with apple and cranberry stuffing into a roasting pan. Drizzle with 2tbs olive oil. Roast for 30 minutes.
Peel and chop parsnips, carrots, potatoes and wedges of pumpkin. Coat with 2 tsp olive oil. Transfer to roasting pan. Roast for 1 hour or until turkey is cooked through.
Transfer turkey to a chopping board. Cover with foil to keep warm. Transfer vegetables to a large platter. Drain cooking juices from roasting pan leaving 1 tbs.

Place roasting pan over a medium-high heat. Add butter. When melted, whisk in plain flour. Whisk constantly until mixture is golden. Slowly add 1 cup cranberry juice and sweet sherry, whisking constantly until mixture comes to the boil and thickens. Season.
Strain gravy through a fine sieve into a serving jug. Slice turkey and place on platter with vegetables. Serve with gravy.
